titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration against the French
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the twenty one day of February, 1666. and of Our Reign the eighteenth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
